column3: ['S0: Heat-Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat']
['S2: Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan']
['S3: Chop-Chop tomato roughly (anysize chunks are fine)']
['S4: Peel-Peel 2 instead of 4 large garlic cloves']
['S5: puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer']
['S7: Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan']
['S8: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle and burn them
column4: add minced garlic and spill it ']

column3: ['S10: Saute-Saute the garlic for 1 min and burn the garlic']
['S11: mix-mix well contents of the pan']
['S12: Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan']
['S13: Add-Add tomato puree to the pan']
['S14: Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan']
['S15: simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 1 minute instead of 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick']
['S16: Take-Take the pan off the heat']
['S17: Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl']
